english.title: Gogistics
english.services_description: Gogistics Ltd. is a business consulting company focused on development of cloud applications. Assist market development for companies which need technical advise. Partner with leading companies specializing in cloud services
english.about_description: We are committed to assisting you grow your business through excellent marketing development. We believe that what your customers hear about your business is as important as the products you sell. We're dedicated to providing you with the highest quality customer service and your complete satisfaction

alan_tai.name: Alan Tai
alan_tai.title: Co-founder & CEO
alan_tai.description: From mechanical engineering to development of cloud applications, Alan Tai has diverse experience in different fields.
